name: Ever Legion
description:
The army of "Deathless" spread the horrors to every corner of the Nevria, growing amid mutual hostility and suspicion between humans, orcs, and elves.
To save your family from being turned into undead monsters, you embark on an adventure. But as your journey progresses, you discover that thousands of "Deathless" are just pawns in the hands of the Necromancer Balor...
You can summon epic hero combinations from all races and faiths to form your team, take on powerful foes, and discover another dark force cloaked in the shadows as the campaign continues.

Beautiful Fully 3D Fantasy World
Several years of research and development, ultra-realistic 3D graphics and models, and a grand worldview are all packed into this amazing fantasy RPG!

Unique Heroes & Strategic Game-Play
Form a party by recruiting thousands of Heroes from seven different factions, including Illuminated, Ardent, Vitalus, Eternal, Euda-Anointed, Daeva-Anointed, and Elemental.
Level up your Heroes, unlock ultimate skills, learn your factional strengths and weaknesses, develop a strategy... and you will crush all the enemies in Ever Legion!

Offline Rewards & Various Side Quests
Are you fed up with overly time-consuming gameplay? Come and enjoy our Mobile Fantasy Idle RPG! Each time you come back to the game, you'll find yourself better able to face the challenges!
With many side quests like the Spirit Realm and the Isle of Mists, you can enjoy epic adventures with Rogue-like elements.
More fun challenges and rewards are on the way!

PVP Combat & Global Coliseum
Form a Guild with players from all over the world and defeat Guild Boss to earn great rewards. Compete with adventurers in the global Coliseum to earn a place in the Rankings.
Fighting for glory! Fight for the champion!

▲Subscription Info:
1. Subscription Packages: Weekly subscription and monthly subscription.
2. Subscriptions include benefits such as +10% Imperial Crown loot and much more.
3. An extra 3 Days will be included for free in your initial weekly or monthly subscription.
4. Subscriptions will be automatically renewed. Subscription cancellation will need to be done manually should you choose to cancel your subscription.
5. Once your subscription has been confirmed, fees will be deducted from your iTunes account.
6. If your subscription has not been cancelled 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription, your subscription will automatically be renewed.
7. A purchase confirmation will be sent to your account within 24 hours before the end of the subscription.
8. Should you wish to cancel your subscription, you can cancel in account settings.
9. Unfortunately there are no free trials for subscriptions.
